pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: fiscal year (usu. April 1 to March 31 in Japan)
middle ten days of a month
Middle Ages (in Japan esp. the Kamakura and Muromachi periods)

lessons.japanese: 最近、お腹の周りに肉がついてきたみたい。中年太りかな。
lessons.english: I'm getting a spare tire around my waist. I guess it's middle age creeping up on me.

lessons.japanese: 最近、お腹の周りに肉がついてきたみたい。中年太りかな。
lessons.english: Recently, I've been putting on a little weight around my waist. I guess it's middle-age spread.

lessons.japanese: 最近、お腹の周りに肉がついてきたみたい。中年太りかな。
lessons.english: My waist size has recently increased. I guess it's middle-age spread.
